Playlist Class¶

class src.main.python.flaskserv.model.Playlist.Playlist(db_handle)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for accessing the playlist database. Has metaclass Database.DBAccessory. Requires a table in format

playlist

s_id (long), u_id (long), vote (long)

Parameters:db_handle (str) – database handle in which playlist table exists
